meanings.definition: To remove a cover or covering from.
meanings.sent1: She uncovers the book to see the picture inside.
meanings.sent2: The detective uncovers the hidden clue under the rug.
meanings.sent3: The magician uncovers the rabbit, surprising the audience.
meanings.sent4: As the sun sets, it uncovers the beauty of the painted sky.
meanings.sent5: The wind uncovers the buried treasure on the beach.

meanings.sent1: The journalist uncovers the truth behind the scandal.
meanings.sent2: The archaeologist uncovers ancient artifacts in the ruins.
meanings.sent3: The comedian uncovers a hilarious joke that makes everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: Her smile uncovers the happiness hidden within her heart.
meanings.sent5: The documentary uncovers the history of the lost civilization.
